text: Efstathios Dimitrios Kappos (born July 31, 1979 in Toronto, Ontario) is a Greek Canadian football (soccer) player, who plays for Agios Dimitrios. Now he plays in a local club in a north suburb of Athens, Neopedelikos. ==Career== Kappos has played his entire football career in Greece, most lately serving lower league sides. He did however enjoy short spells at Greek premier league sides AEK Athens and Aris Saloniki as well as a couple of seasons with Kalamata. Kappos has left Akratitos F.C. on a free transfer to join Messiniakos F.C. (C Ethniki - South) on 2 August 2006. Kappos played previously with Aris FC and AEK Athens F.C. while Messiniakos F.C. is in first place in their division in the 2006/2007 season. ==International career== He played his one and only game for the Canada national soccer team on 18 January 2004 against Barbados national football team in a friendly game.18.1.2004 - CAN 1:0 BRB - Friendly match international amical ==References== == External links == * Canada Soccer Profile * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian people of Greek descent Category:Soccer people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Toronto Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Canada men's international soccer players Category:Canadian expatriate soccer players Category:Canadian expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Kalamata F.C. players Category:AEK Athens F.C. players Category:Aris Thessaloniki F.C. players Category:Akratitos F.C. players Category:Messiniakos F.C. players Category:Fostiras F.C. players Category:Thyella Patras F.C. players Category:Aias Salamina F.C. players Category:Agios Dimitrios F.C. title: Stathis Kappos
